articles.description: The reviews are in.
articles.content:
Ms Marvel, the latest show from Marvel, is set to premiere on Disney+ on June 8 and – going by the first reactions from reviewers – it's likely to become an MCU favourite. 
The series tells the stor… [+2341 chars]

articles.author: Millie Bull
articles.title: George Clarke says couple broke 'main rule' of property developing leading to slim profit - Express
articles.description: GEORGE CLARKE claimed a couple broke one of the 'cardinal rules' of property developing on the new Channel 4 show, George Clarke's Flipping Fast. The couple, who were renovating a home in the northeast, only made a slim profit after breaking 'main rule of dev…
